ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry

cookingTips: Line muffin tin with prosciutto slices, overlapping to create cups before baking
Squeeze spinach thoroughly to remove excess moisture and prevent watery filling
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Prosciutto cups are elegant appetizers with a savory filling. How will you achieve crispy prosciutto cups while keeping the filling creamy and well-seasoned?
